Description:
Detects the creation of a named pipe with a pattern found in CobaltStrike malleable C2 profiles

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Christian Burkard (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: CobaltStrike Named Pipe Patterns
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((((pipe_name like '\dsernamepipe%' or pipe_name like '\f4c3%' or pipe_name like '\f53f%' or pipe_name like '\fullduplex_%' or pipe_name like '\mojo.5688.8052.183894939787088877%' or pipe_name like '\mojo.5688.8052.35780273329370473%' or pipe_name like '\msftewds%' or pipe_name like '\msrpc_%' or pipe_name like '\mypipe-f%' or pipe_name like '\mypipe-h%' or pipe_name like '\ntsvcs%' or pipe_name like '\pgmessagepipe%' or pipe_name like '\rpc_%' or pipe_name like '\scerpc%' or pipe_name like '\searchtextharvester%' or pipe_name like '\spoolss%' or pipe_name like '\win_svc%' or pipe_name like '\win\msrpc_%' or pipe_name like '\windows.update.manager%' or pipe_name like '\wkssvc%') and (pipe_name = '\demoagent_11' or pipe_name = '\demoagent_22')) or (pipe_name like '\winsock2\catalogchangelistener-%' and pipe_name like '%-0,')) and  not (pipe_name = '\wkssvc' or pipe_name = '\spoolss' or pipe_name = '\scerpc' or pipe_name = '\ntsvcs' or pipe_name = '\searchtextharvester' or pipe_name = '\pgmessagepipe' or pipe_name = '\msftewds') and  not ((process_path like '%:\program files\websense\%' or process_path like '%:\program files (x86)\websense\%') and (pipe_name like '\dsernamepiper%' or pipe_name like '\dsernamepipew%')))
